ygData.subject: Requesting a spoiler or ANY information on Bull Smasher.
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings everyone, I have a small information or spoiler request. I m looking for any and all information regarding Bull Smasher, a one handed blunt weapon I
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings everyone, I have a small information or spoiler request. I'm
looking for any and all information regarding Bull Smasher, a one handed
blunt weapon I saw talked about on The Druid's Grove. The stats as I
remember them are Damage 6 Delay 20, +2 Str/Agi/Dex, and useable by
Halflings/Gnomes/Dwarves. The person in question did not know where to
get it, but heard it was a quest in Ak'Anon. Can anyone pleaes help me
with this? Thank you.
